title: Jackpine journey
creator_credit: Associated Screen Studios, Canadian Pacific Railway and Earl Clark
brief_description: A CPR steam train speeds through northern forest intercut with the story of vacationists enjoying nature. Scenes of: men canoeing along Ontario waterways, installing campsites, and fishing; spectacular scenery, especially near rapids and falls; and all types of wildlife. Narrated by Peel Stevens.
